attributes.title: WORST APP I HAVE EVER USED
attributes.review: This is app is horrible, I have never used nothing worse like this app. It shouldn’t even exist, I wouldn’t recommend to anyone. It ruined my phone and is ruining this country as we speak.

attributes.title: Bad use of time
attributes.review: Such a terrible app, maybe they should use the brain cells on things the people of this country want instead of a dumb app. The orange will lose supporters wasting brain cells like this

attributes.title: Oof
attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app really sadly let me down. :( As soon as I went into the app it says “Keep America Great” but I was so confused...when was America ever great? Better luck next time I suppose :(

attributes.title: TRASHY APP
attributes.review: Hi I downloaded this app and it froze a lot and it kept crashing.
I had very high hopes for this app to be 🧚amazing🧚. Didn’t turn out to be good, I didn’t know how to go to the rallies or any of that stuff, actually never planning on coming to one 🥰.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: To be honest if I could leave a less than a one star review I would. The app glitches, it loads very slowly and it kicks me out often I hate this app —sincerely TikTok

attributes.title: HORRIBLE.
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app and Karen walk bye to me and started hitting me in the face and the FBI came to my house to tell me that it was not OK to download the Trump app I am sister really not OK and this is not OK for them to do you know what Trump stupid stupid bye

attributes.title: Disgusting, repulsive, awful
attributes.review: I don’t know why anyone likes this Cheeto puff, this app is disgusting in every way, please do everything you can in your power to give this app one star

attributes.title: I love tiktok
attributes.review: Wow this app is horrible. Definitely not here from TikTok. The first thing when you sign is a orange 🍊. Kinda reminds me of our president. This app is horrible and glitchy, definitely do not recommend

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Expected information on his re-election, seems to be just another platform to spread hate and division in the country. Not what we need right now.
